snippet.title: Little Problems: A Cozy Detective Game - Official Reveal Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description: Dive into the world of Little Problems in this charming reveal trailer for the upcoming cozy detective game. Meet the characters, and take a peek at puzzles and gameplay in this trailer for Little Problems ahead of the game's release this winter on PC (via Steam). Little Problems is about solving mysteries around minor inconveniences, everyday misunderstandings, and of course, little problems. This game is not about saving the world; it's about enriching it, one case at a time.
